title: macOS build failed with 'ld: unknown option: --no-as-needed'
body_html:
The build command that result in this error is

clang -bundle -undefined dynamic_lookup -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -arch x86_64 build/temp.macosx-10.6-x86_64-3.6/torch/csrc/nvrtc.o -L/Users/odin/local/pytorch/torch/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib/stubs -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -lnvrtc -lcuda -o build/lib.macosx-10.6-x86_64-3.6/torch/_nvrtc.cpython-36m-darwin.so -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib -Wl,-rpath,@loader_path/lib
ld: unknown option: --no-as-needed
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
error: command 'clang' failed with exit status 1
body_text:
The build command that result in this error is
clang -bundle -undefined dynamic_lookup -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -arch x86_64 build/temp.macosx-10.6-x86_64-3.6/torch/csrc/nvrtc.o -L/Users/odin/local/pytorch/torch/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib/stubs -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -lnvrtc -lcuda -o build/lib.macosx-10.6-x86_64-3.6/torch/_nvrtc.cpython-36m-darwin.so -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib -Wl,-rpath,@loader_path/lib
ld: unknown option: --no-as-needed
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
error: command 'clang' failed with exit status 1
body:
The build command that result in this error is 

```
clang -bundle -undefined dynamic_lookup -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -arch x86_64 build/temp.macosx-10.6-x86_64-3.6/torch/csrc/nvrtc.o -L/Users/odin/local/pytorch/torch/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib -L/usr/local/cuda/lib/stubs -L/Users/odin/miniconda3/lib -lnvrtc -lcuda -o build/lib.macosx-10.6-x86_64-3.6/torch/_nvrtc.cpython-36m-darwin.so -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib -Wl,-rpath,@loader_path/lib
ld: unknown option: --no-as-needed
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
error: command 'clang' failed with exit status 1
```
